entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Chevery
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 07:17 AM AST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -10.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Chevery 07:00 AM AST Saturday 14 January 2023

Humidity: 76 %

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow and blowing snow. High minus 8.

entry.summary: Periods of light snow and local blowing snow ending overnight then cloudy. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Saturday 14 January 2023
